set(TINYXML_INSTALL_DIR ${THIRDPARTY_INSTALL_FOLDER}/tinyxml)
set(TINYXML_INCLUDE_DIR ${TINYXML_INSTALL_DIR}/include CACHE PATH INTERNAL)
set(TINYXML_LIB_DIR ${TINYXML_INSTALL_DIR}/lib CACHE PATH INTERNAL)

ExternalProject_Add(tinyxml 
	GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2 GIT_TAG "4.0.1"
	UPDATE_COMMAND ""
	CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=${TINYXML_INSTALL_DIR})

add_custom_command(TARGET tinyxml
	POST_BUILD
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy ${THIRDPARTY_INSTALL_FOLDER}/tinyxml/bin/tinyxml2.dll ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/${CMAKE_CFG_INTDIR}/tinyxml2.dll
	)
